place: Seefeldstrasse 54, parterre rechts, Zurich VIII, Switzerland
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Pinker: Mr John Marshall, publisher, of New York has cabled me that he will publish my novel—the full text. The terms are 15% for the first 1000, thereafter 20% and £10 in advance. Kindly conclude this transaction with him at once and will you please let me know what news you have of the English edition as well as of my play, the verses and the royalties of Dubliners, sincerely yours James Joyce
